scenes.name: Step 1: [photo of the smiling girl on the street]
Step 2:  [photo of the smiling girl on the street] [girl: nice to see you! Where do you want to eat?]
Step 4: [photo of the girl with a grumpy face] [Sorry, I am afraid I have to go!]
Step 5: [photo of the smiling girl on the street] [Girl: You are so nice! I would be happy to have a muffin with coffe]
Step 7: [photo girl in the cafe, choosing food]
Step 8: [photo girl sitting on the table, with coffee and muffin][Girl: Such a nice place]
Step 9: [photo of the girl with a cup of coffee] [Girl:  What do you do for a living?]
Step 10: [photo of the laughing girl] [Girl: Ahahaha! Interesting!]
Step 11: [photo of the girl with neutral face] [you are chatting about your lives, hobbies, jobs, etc] [Girl: Sorry, I have to go. It was nice to chat with you!]

dialogs.line: It is so nice to see you! How are you?
Hello, Jenny!! Wow! You look fantastic!
Hello, stranger! I am glad that aliens haven’t kidnap you!
Hello! What was your name again? I always forget! (-+, go to step 3 if charm big enough, if not enough go to step 4)
It is not important part, the important part - I am going to eat with you!
Have I mentioned that I am vegan? I need some vegan-friendly place (-+, if charm big enough go to step 6, if not enough go to step 4)
How about a Very Nice Place? It is nearby
The kitchen of my apartment is a pretty nice place, do you want to check?
I am so sorry! Would you give me one more chance, please?
Nonono! You’ve promised me lunch!
You should not eat muffins! Sugar is killing you!
I love muffins! I know the place with the best muffins in the city! I bet you will love their crazy-frazy-bluberrezy muffin!
Let me choose for you! I have a feeling that I know what would you like! My treat
Hope you will like it
Choose carefully please, I have only $20 to spend, I can’t afford more (-=, if the charm is big enough go to step 8, if not - go to step 4)
Yup! My ex-girlfriend loved this place too. Many things here remind me about her (--, if the charm is big enough  go to step 9, if not - go to step 4)
I am so glad you like it! This place has been founded  47 years ago, can you imagine!?!

I am not a big fan of their style actually. This place would look much better with a statue of the pink flamingo in the middle, you know. (=+, if unique is too big go to step 4, otherwise go to step 9)
My coffee could be hotter, I hate when my coffee is cold! Why it is happening with me all the time???  (--, if the charm is big enough  go to step 9, if not - go to step 4)
I am a software developer. In a serious relationship with my computer… (++, go to step 11)
I don’t like the idea of having a job. I think life is about having the pleasure (--, if the charm is big enough go to step 11, otherwise go to step 4)
First, you tell me what is your job. Is your salary big enough? (-=, go to step 11)
Not as interesting as the poster on the wall of my room. Do you want to have a look? (-+, if your charm is big enough, go to step 11, otherwise go to step 4)
Thank you very much for your time! Hope we will have at least one more chance to meet! (+=, go to step 12)
Of course, you are so busy, you have no time for losers like me…. I understand... (-- go to step 4)
It was very nice to see you! Next time we can finally jump from SkyTower! (=+, go to step 12)
